H0.text: The Kina is the monetary unit of which Oceania country. Papua

H1.text: The Kina is the monetary unit of which Oceania country. Solomon Islands

H2.text: The Kina is the monetary unit of which Oceania country. Vanuatu

H3.text: The Kina is the monetary unit of which Oceania country. Niugini

A4.text: The national currency, the Kina, is regulated by the Bank of Papua New Guinea
